title: Rapha Womenâ€™s all-day leggings & shorts take on-the-bike comfort to post-ride life, workouts
content:
Rapha has added a new All Day Leggings & Shorts to the women’s line-up in a distinct move away from cycling-only gear. The design and functionality is definitely inspired by traditional cycling wear, but has been tweaked to work just as well for a run, a yoga session, or even simply lounging around at home […]

The post Rapha Women’s all-day leggings & shorts take on-the-bike comfort to post-ride life, workouts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
